ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(OR( RTL_Product_Name_Str__c = 'CYC',RTL_Product_Name_Str__c = 'CYB', RTL_Product_Name_Str__c = 'NEW', RTL_Product_Name_Str__c = 'USED', RTL_Product_Name_Str__c = 'CYB Revolving'),(RTL_Preferred_Branch_Name__c = 'AL Marketing')),(RTL_LastName__c = null),false)
